title: docs: tutorials: rolling alice: coach alice: down the dependency rabbit hole again: Complete tutorial

labels.name: 2ndparty
labels.description: Will be a 2nd party plugin, pending 2nd party org

labels.name: Alice
labels.description: Work related to our tutorial series "Rolling Alice"

body:
To start work on this issue:

```console
$ REC_TITLE="docs: tutorials: rolling alice: coach alice: down the dependency rabbit hole again: https://github.com/intel/dffml/issues/1421" exec bash
```

- First we're just doing simple openssl demo where package is
  distributed as binary wheel via static pypi, with sbom deployment.
  We'll also show how we use VEX and basic `policy.yml` to triage
  (openssl server vs. client applicability).
  - https://github.com/tpm2-software/tpm2-pytss (this should ldd to openssl)
  - https://github.com/intel/cve-bin-tool
  - https://github.com/CycloneDX/cyclonedx-bom-exchange-api
  - https://github.com/CycloneDX/cyclonedx-bom-repo-server
  - https://github.com/OR13/endor
- References
  - [2022-11-14 @pdxjohnny Engineering Logs](https://github.com/intel/dffml/discussions/1406?sort=new#discussioncomment-4136717)
  - https://tpm2-pytss.readthedocs.io/en/latest/testing.html
  - https://github.com/intel/cve-bin-tool
- Related
  - https://github.com/intel/dffml/issues/596
- Future
  - [ ] Update `Architecting Alice: Stream of Consciousness` to include notes on
        building off of `Architecting Alice: She's Arriving When?` to now communicate
        between Alice and Bob via SBOM, VEX, VDR, etc. rolled in.
